content: these dogs come straight out of my new picture book *short dog long dog* is a book all about dogs doing opposites because dogs come in all shapes sizes barks and personalities from huge and tiny to itchy on the head and scratchy on the hiney they re the perfect subjects on the topic of antonyms find it at amazon 1 and other major booksellers and hopefully also at your local bookstore and yarn shop too if not ask them to get it this free pattern is a quick simple project that will make a short dog or a long dog your choice either or both will make a fun gift to go with *short dog long dog* enjoy 1 https //www amazon com/short-dog-long-book-opposites/dp/1250907209/
